profile.title: Your Profile
profile.description: View and manage your coaching profile information
profile.noProfileFound: No profile found. Please complete the assessment to create your profile.

hero.title: Your Personal AI Dating Coach
hero.subtitle: Build confidence. Gain clarity. Find love — one step at a time.
hero.description: A fully personalized coaching journey, guided by an intelligent and emotionally aware AI coach.
hero.disclaimer: Starting free • No credit card required • Cancel anytime

howItWorks.title: How the Coaching Journey Works
howItWorks.subtitle: A structured approach to personal growth and relationship readiness

step1.title: Create Your Profile
step1.description: Fill out an assessment that helps your AI coach understand you deeply — your personality, past relationships, current challenges, and goals.

step2.title: Meet Your AI Coach
step2.description: Begin an ongoing, dynamic conversation with your personal AI coach — tailored just for you.

step3.title: Follow a Personalized Plan
step3.description: Get step-by-step guidance through exercises, reflections, and challenges that match your pace and emotional state.

step4.title: Track Your Progress
step4.description: The coach remembers everything — your answers, your growth, your completed exercises — and adjusts the plan as you evolve.

step5.title: Build Real Confidence & Connection
step5.description: The goal isn't just to find someone — it's to become ready for the right kind of relationship.

differentiators.title: Why This Isn't Just Another Chatbot
differentiators.subtitle: A fundamentally different approach to relationship coaching

notGeneric.title: Not Generic — Tailored to You
notGeneric.description: A real training plan designed specifically for your personality, goals, and relationship history.

remembers.title: Remembers Your Journey
remembers.description: The AI coach remembers your history and adapts as you grow, building on every conversation.

expertBuilt.title: Built by Experts
expertBuilt.description: Developed with experts in emotional intelligence, dating psychology, and coaching methodologies.

longTerm.title: Long-term Relationship Readiness
longTerm.description: Designed for lasting change, not just quick dating tips — become ready for the right relationship.

private.title: Private & Judgment-Free
private.description: Safe, secure, and completely confidential. No judgment, just personalized guidance.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about AI coaching

q1.question: Is this really free?
q1.answer: Yes, you can start with a free plan. Premium features may be added later.

q2.question: Is this a real person or AI?
q2.answer: It's an advanced AI coach trained to guide you with warmth, empathy, and structure.

q3.question: How long does the process take?
q3.answer: It's self-paced. Some users go through the core program in 3–6 weeks, others take more time.

q4.question: Do I need experience in dating to start?
q4.answer: Not at all. The coach adapts to your level — whether you're new or experienced.

q5.question: Is my data private?
q5.answer: Yes. Everything is stored securely and never shared.

cta.title: Start Your Personalized Journey Today
cta.subtitle: Join thousands who have transformed their dating life with personalized AI coaching. Your journey to meaningful connections starts here.
cta.disclaimer: No credit card required • Start immediately • Cancel anytime

pricing.title: Choose Your Coaching Plan
pricing.subtitle: Select the perfect plan for your relationship journey
pricing.mainSubtitle: Start your relationship coaching journey with our AI-powered platform. Choose a plan that fits your needs and budget.

free.name: Free
free.description: Perfect for getting started with AI coaching

monthly.name: Monthly
monthly.description: Enhanced coaching with more personalized guidance

yearly.name: Yearly
yearly.description: Full access to all coaching features and programs

notSure.title: Not sure which plan is right for you?
notSure.description: Start with our free plan and upgrade anytime. All plans include access to our AI coach and basic relationship guidance.

canChange.question: Can I change my plan anytime?
canChange.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

dataSecure.question: Is my data secure?
dataSecure.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade security to protect your personal information and conversations.

notSatisfied.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
notSatisfied.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. No questions asked.

howWorks.question: How does AI coaching work?
howWorks.answer: Our AI coach is trained on relationship psychology and adapts to your communication style and needs.

assessment.profileDescription: Help us understand your relationship goals and preferences
assessment.editProfileDescription: Update your relationship goals and preferences

welcome.title: Welcome to Your Personal Coaching Journey!
welcome.description: Before we begin, let's get to know you better. This assessment will help us create a personalized coaching experience tailored to your unique relationship goals and communication style.

expectations.steps: 6 quick steps to build your personal profile
expectations.personalized: Your responses help create personalized coaching programs
expectations.private: All information is private and secure

goals.title: What are your relationship goals?
goals.description: Select all the areas you'd like to work on. We'll personalize your coaching accordingly.

challenges.title: What challenges are you currently facing?
challenges.description: Select the areas where you'd like support. Being honest helps us provide better guidance.

time-management.label: Time Management
time-management.description: Struggling to spend quality time together

communication.title: How do you prefer to communicate?
communication.description: Understanding your communication style helps us tailor coaching strategies that work best for you.

direct-honest.label: Direct & Honest
direct-honest.description: I prefer straightforward, honest communication even if it might be uncomfortable
direct-honest.example: Let's talk about this issue directly and work through it together

gentle-supportive.label: Gentle & Supportive
gentle-supportive.description: I like warm, encouraging communication that focuses on positive solutions
gentle-supportive.example: I understand how you feel, and I'm here to support you through this

analytical-logical.label: Analytical & Logical
analytical-logical.description: I prefer fact-based discussions with clear reasoning and practical solutions
analytical-logical.example: Let's look at the facts and figure out the most logical approach to solve this

emotional-expressive.label: Emotional & Expressive
emotional-expressive.description: I communicate best when we can share feelings openly and emotionally
emotional-expressive.example: I need us to really share how we're feeling about this situation

collaborative-democratic.label: Collaborative & Democratic
collaborative-democratic.description: I like when we make decisions together and everyone has equal input
collaborative-democratic.example: What do you think? Let's brainstorm solutions together and decide as a team

patient-thoughtful.label: Patient & Thoughtful
patient-thoughtful.description: I prefer taking time to think things through before discussing important topics
patient-thoughtful.example: Can we take some time to think about this and discuss it when we're both ready?

personality.title: Tell us about your personality & preferences
personality.description: This helps us personalize your coaching style and recommendations.
personality.socialEnergyLabel: Social Energy: How do you recharge?
personality.empathyLabel: Empathy Level: How easily do you understand others' emotions?
personality.conflictStyleLabel: How do you typically handle conflicts?

collaborator.label: Collaborator
collaborator.description: Work together to find win-win solutions

accommodator.label: Accommodator
accommodator.description: Prefer to keep peace and compromise

avoider.label: Avoider
avoider.description: Prefer to cool down before addressing conflicts

personality.learningPreferenceLabel: How do you prefer to learn new things?
personality.prioritiesLabel: What are your top life priorities? (Select up to 3)

emotionalIntelligence.title: Understanding Your Emotional Landscape
emotionalIntelligence.description: Self-awareness is the foundation of healthy relationships. Let's explore your emotional patterns, strengths, and areas for growth.
emotionalIntelligence.attachmentStyleDescription: How do you typically approach closeness and intimacy in relationships?

secure.label: Secure
secure.description: I find it easy to get close to others and am comfortable depending on them. I don't often worry about being abandoned.

anxious.label: Anxious
anxious.description: I want to be very close to partners, but worry they don't feel the same. I fear being abandoned or unloved.

avoidant.label: Avoidant
avoidant.description: I prefer independence and self-sufficiency. I sometimes find it difficult to trust others completely.

disorganized.label: Fearful-Avoidant
disorganized.description: I want close relationships but worry about getting hurt. I have mixed feelings about depending on others.

unsure.label: I'm not sure
unsure.description: I need to learn more about my attachment patterns.

emotionalIntelligence.fearsDescription: What fears or anxieties do you notice in relationships? It's normal to have these.

fearOptions.not-good-enough: Fear of not being good enough

emotionalIntelligence.strengthsDescription: What are your superpowers when it comes to relationships and emotions?
emotionalIntelligence.challengesDescription: What emotional skills would you like to develop or improve?
emotionalIntelligence.readinessDescription: How ready do you feel to start or work on a romantic relationship right now?

5.label: Ready
5.description: Open to finding the right person

lifestyleCompatibility.title: Lifestyle & Compatibility
lifestyleCompatibility.description: Understanding how you live, communicate, and handle challenges helps us recommend coaching strategies that fit your natural patterns and preferences.
lifestyleCompatibility.workLifeBalanceDescription: How do you approach the balance between career and personal life?

work-focused.label: Career-Focused
work-focused.description: Work is a top priority, long hours are common

balanced.label: Balanced Approach
balanced.description: Equal importance to work and personal life

life-focused.label: Life-Focused
life-focused.description: Personal life and relationships come first

flexible.label: Flexible & Adaptive
flexible.description: Balance shifts based on life circumstances

lifestyleCompatibility.socialEnergyDescription: How much do you enjoy being around people and social activities?
lifestyleCompatibility.hobbiesDescription: What activities do you enjoy? This helps us understand your lifestyle and what you might want to share with a partner.
lifestyleCompatibility.communicationStyleDescription: How do you typically communicate in relationships?

direct-straightforward.label: Direct & Straightforward
direct-straightforward.description: I say what I mean clearly and appreciate the same

gentle-diplomatic.label: Gentle & Diplomatic
gentle-diplomatic.description: I choose words carefully to maintain harmony

expressive-emotional.label: Expressive & Emotional
expressive-emotional.description: I share feelings openly and connect emotionally

analytical-logical.label: Analytical & Logical
analytical-logical.description: I prefer facts, reasoning, and structured discussions

playful-humorous.label: Playful & Humorous
playful-humorous.description: I use humor and lightness to connect and communicate

lifestyleCompatibility.conflictStyleDescription: How do you prefer to handle disagreements or conflicts?

address-immediately.label: Address Immediately
address-immediately.description: I prefer to talk through issues right away

cool-down-first.label: Cool Down First
cool-down-first.description: I need space to process before discussing conflicts

collaborative-problem-solving.label: Collaborative Problem-Solving
collaborative-problem-solving.description: I focus on finding solutions together

avoid-if-possible.label: Avoid If Possible
avoid-if-possible.description: I prefer to let minor issues resolve naturally

seek-compromise.label: Seek Compromise
seek-compromise.description: I look for middle ground where both can be happy

selfReflection.title: Self-Reflection & Growth
selfReflection.description: The final step in your journey of self-discovery. These insights help us understand how you see yourself and what you're working toward in relationships.
selfReflection.friendsDescriptionTitle: How Your Friends Would Describe You
selfReflection.friendsDescriptionDescription: If your closest friends were describing you to someone new, what would they say? Think about the qualities they admire and the way you show up in their lives.
selfReflection.friendsDescriptionPlaceholder: My friends would probably say I'm... They'd mention that I... When they think of me, they think of someone who...
selfReflection.proudestMomentDescription: Think of a time when you felt really proud of yourself - not necessarily a big achievement, but a moment that showed your character, values, or growth.
selfReflection.proudestMomentPlaceholder: I'm most proud of the time when I... This showed me that I... It made me realize...
selfReflection.growthAreaDescription: What's one area where you'd most like to grow or improve as a person? This could be a skill, habit, mindset, or way of being in relationships.
selfReflection.growthAreaPlaceholder: I'd most like to grow in... This would help me because... I'm working on this by...
selfReflection.personalStrengthsDescription: What are your superpowers as a person? Choose the qualities that you feel represent you best.
selfReflection.relationshipGoalsDescription: What do you most want to achieve or improve in your future relationships?

valuesVision.title: Your Values & Relationship Vision
valuesVision.description: Understanding what matters most to you helps us match you with coaching strategies and insights that align with your deepest values and relationship dreams.
valuesVision.coreValuesDescription: What values are absolutely essential in your relationships? These guide your decisions and define what matters most.
valuesVision.relationshipVisionDescription: Describe your ideal relationship in 3-5 sentences. What would it feel like? How would you and your partner interact? What would your daily life together look like?
valuesVision.relationshipVisionPlaceholder: In my ideal relationship, we would... We'd spend our time... I'd feel... Together we would...
valuesVision.lifePrioritiesDescription: What are the most important areas of life for you right now? This helps us understand your current focus.
valuesVision.dealBreakersDescription: What behaviors or qualities would be absolutely unacceptable in a relationship? Knowing your boundaries is crucial.

enhancedSummary.title: Assessment Complete! 🎉
enhancedSummary.description: Thank you for taking this journey of self-discovery. Here's what we learned about you and how we can support your relationship goals.

profileCompletion.title: Profile Completion
profileCompletion.description: You've completed {completed} out of {total} sections - excellent depth!

aiInsights.title: AI-Powered Insights
aiInsights.analyzing: Analyzing your responses and generating personalized insights...
aiInsights.unableToGenerate: Unable to generate insights at this time. Your profile has been saved and you can continue to your coaching program.

nextSteps.title: Ready to Begin Your Coaching Journey?
nextSteps.description: Your personalized coaching program is ready! Based on your assessment, we'll guide you through targeted exercises and insights designed specifically for your goals and style.

relationshipStatus.title: What's your current relationship status?
relationshipStatus.description: This helps us provide the most relevant coaching guidance for your situation.

dating.label: Dating
dating.description: In the early stages of dating

married.label: Married
married.description: Married or in a civil partnership

divorced.label: Divorced
divorced.description: Divorced and looking to improve future relationships

widowed.label: Widowed
widowed.description: Lost a partner and ready to move forward

summary.title: Review Your Profile
summary.description: Please review your responses below. This information will be used to personalize your coaching experience.

nextSteps.title: What happens next?
items: Your AI coach will use this profile to personalize your experience
You'll receive customized coaching programs based on your goals
Conversation style will match your communication preferences
You can update your profile anytime in settings

welcome.title: Welcome to Your Love Journey
welcome.description: You're about to embark on a personalized journey of self-discovery and relationship growth. This assessment helps us understand who you are, what you want, and how we can best support you.
welcome.confidentiality: Your responses are private and confidential

duration.title: 15-20 Minutes
duration.description: Take your time - this isn't a race. You can save and return anytime.

personal.title: Deeply Personal
personal.description: We'll explore your values, fears, dreams, and relationship patterns.

aiInsights.title: AI-Powered Insights
aiInsights.description: Get personalized coaching tailored to your unique personality and goals.

private.title: Completely Private
private.description: Your responses are confidential and used only to personalize your experience.

selfDiscovery.title: Self-Discovery
selfDiscovery.description: Understand your values, attachment style, and what makes you uniquely you.

relationshipReadiness.title: Relationship Readiness
relationshipReadiness.description: Assess where you are emotionally and what you need to build healthy connections.

personalizedGrowth.title: Personalized Growth
personalizedGrowth.description: Get a coaching program designed specifically for your goals and learning style.

readyToBegin.title: Ready to Begin?
readyToBegin.description: This journey is about you - your growth, your goals, and your path to meaningful connection. Be honest, be curious, and trust the process.

welcome.disclaimer: Takes 15-20 minutes • Save and resume anytime • Completely confidential

identity.title: Let's Get to Know You
identity.description: Help us personalize your experience by sharing a bit about yourself.
identity.namePlaceholder: Your first name or preferred name
identity.nameDescription: This helps us make the coaching feel more personal and welcoming.
identity.ageDescription: Helps us tailor advice for your life stage.
identity.genderDescription: This helps us use appropriate language and examples in your coaching.

relationshipHistory.title: Your Relationship Story
relationshipHistory.description: Understanding your relationship history helps us provide coaching that honors your journey and builds on what you've learned.
relationshipHistory.significantPastQuestion: Have you had any significant romantic relationships in the past?
relationshipHistory.durationQuestion: How long was your most significant relationship?
relationshipHistory.timeSinceQuestion: How long has it been since your last relationship ended?
relationshipHistory.lessonsQuestion: What's one important lesson you've learned from your past relationships?
relationshipHistory.lessonsDescription: This could be about communication, boundaries, red flags, or what you need in a partner.
relationshipHistory.healingQuestion: How are you feeling about this past relationship now?
relationshipHistory.healingDescription: Are you still processing, feeling healed, or somewhere in between?

emotionalIntelligence.title: Your Emotional Landscape
emotionalIntelligence.description: Understanding your emotional patterns helps us provide more effective coaching.
emotionalIntelligence.attachmentStyleQuestion: How do you typically feel in close relationships?

secure.label: Secure
secure.description: I feel comfortable with intimacy and independence

anxious.label: Anxious
anxious.description: I worry about being abandoned or not being enough

avoidant.label: Avoidant
avoidant.description: I value independence and sometimes feel uncomfortable with closeness

disorganized.label: Mixed/Unclear
disorganized.description: My feelings about relationships vary a lot

emotionalIntelligence.fearsQuestion: What fears or concerns do you have about relationships?
emotionalIntelligence.strengthsQuestion: What are your greatest strengths in relationships?
emotionalIntelligence.challengesQuestion: What emotional challenges do you face in relationships?
emotionalIntelligence.readinessQuestion: On a scale of 1-10, how ready do you feel for a serious relationship?
emotionalIntelligence.readinessDescription: 1 = Not ready at all, 10 = Completely ready

valuesVision.title: Your Values & Vision
valuesVision.description: Understanding what matters most to you helps us guide you toward compatible connections.
valuesVision.coreValuesQuestion: What values are most important to you?

lifestyleCompatibility.title: Your Lifestyle & Communication
lifestyleCompatibility.description: Let's understand how you live and communicate to find the best matches.
lifestyleCompatibility.workLifeBalanceQuestion: How would you describe your work-life balance?
lifestyleCompatibility.hobbiesQuestion: What are your main hobbies and interests?
lifestyleCompatibility.communicationStyleQuestion: How do you prefer to communicate?

selfReflection.title: Self-Reflection & Growth
selfReflection.description: These deeper questions help us understand your self-awareness and growth mindset.
selfReflection.friendsDescriptionQuestion: How would your closest friends describe you?
selfReflection.proudestMomentQuestion: What's a moment you're really proud of?
selfReflection.proudestMomentPlaceholder: I'm proud of the time when...
selfReflection.growthAreaQuestion: What's the biggest area you want to grow in?
selfReflection.strengthsQuestion: What are your top 3 personal strengths?
selfReflection.futureGoalsQuestion: What are your relationship goals for the future?

taskPage.taskNotFound: Task not found or you don't have access to this task.
taskPage.unsupportedTaskType: Task type "{taskType}" is not yet supported.

coachMessages.reflection: Let's do this together. I'll guide you step by step through this reflection. First — take a deep breath and think about what truly matters to you. This is a safe space to explore your thoughts and feelings.
coachMessages.assessment: Welcome to your assessment! I'm here to help you explore important aspects of yourself. Take your time with each question — there are no right or wrong answers, only honest insights about who you are.
coachMessages.exercise: Ready for some practical work? I'll guide you through this exercise step by step. Remember, this is about progress, not perfection. Let's take this journey together.
coachMessages.journaling: Time for some personal reflection through writing. I'll be here to support you as you explore your thoughts and feelings. Let your authentic voice flow onto the page.
coachMessages.communication: Let's practice some communication skills together! This is a safe space to try new approaches and build your confidence. I'll provide guidance as you work through the exercises.
coachMessages.default: I'm here to support you through this task. Take your time, be honest with yourself, and remember — every step forward is progress worth celebrating.

coachingProgram.name: AI Relationship Coaching Program
coachingProgram.description: A comprehensive 12-stage journey to build deeper self-awareness, heal past patterns, and create the loving relationship you truly desire.

selfDiscovery.name: Self-Discovery
selfDiscovery.description: Build self-awareness and define personal values

pastRelationshipPatterns.name: Past Relationship Patterns
pastRelationshipPatterns.description: Reflect on past experiences to identify patterns and wounds

innerBlocksFears.name: Inner Blocks & Fears

emotionalRegulation.name: Emotional Regulation
emotionalRegulation.description: Learn how to recognize and manage emotional triggers

boundariesStandards.name: Boundaries & Standards

realLifeExposure.name: Real-Life Exposure
realLifeExposure.description: Begin taking intentional action in real life

handlingRejectionUncertainty.name: Handling Rejection & Uncertainty
handlingRejectionUncertainty.description: Build resilience in the face of emotional risk

healthyAttraction.name: Healthy Attraction
healthyAttraction.description: Recognize authentic interest vs. emotional addiction

integrationReadiness.name: Integration & Readiness
integrationReadiness.description: Reflect on growth and prepare for long-term connection

defineCoreValues.title: Define Your Core Values
defineCoreValues.description: List 5 values that are most important to you in life and relationships. Reflect on why.
defineCoreValues.goal: Build self-awareness and define personal values
defineCoreValues.focus: Who am I? What do I really want?

authenticSelfAssessment.title: Your Authentic Self Assessment
authenticSelfAssessment.description: Explore who you are when you feel most yourself and confident.
authenticSelfAssessment.goal: Build self-awareness and define personal values
authenticSelfAssessment.focus: Who am I? What do I really want?

relationshipPatternAnalysis.title: Relationship Pattern Analysis
relationshipPatternAnalysis.description: Describe your most meaningful past relationship. What worked? What didn't?
relationshipPatternAnalysis.goal: Reflect on past experiences to identify patterns and wounds

emotionalWoundsInventory.title: Emotional Wounds Inventory
emotionalWoundsInventory.description: Identify any unresolved hurt or trauma that might be affecting your ability to connect.
emotionalWoundsInventory.goal: Reflect on past experiences to identify patterns and wounds

fearIdentificationExercise.title: Fear Identification Exercise
fearIdentificationExercise.description: What's one thought that often holds you back from opening up to someone new?
fearIdentificationExercise.goal: Explore fears, limiting beliefs, and internal resistance

limitingBeliefChallenge.title: Limiting Belief Challenge
limitingBeliefChallenge.description: Identify and challenge the negative beliefs that create relationship barriers.
limitingBeliefChallenge.goal: Explore fears, limiting beliefs, and internal resistance

triggerResponseAnalysis.title: Trigger Response Analysis
triggerResponseAnalysis.description: Describe a recent emotional trigger and how you reacted. Could you respond differently next time?
triggerResponseAnalysis.goal: Learn how to recognize and manage emotional triggers

emotionalRegulationToolkit.title: Emotional Regulation Toolkit
emotionalRegulationToolkit.description: Develop a personalized set of strategies for managing intense emotions.
emotionalRegulationToolkit.goal: Learn how to recognize and manage emotional triggers

selfCompassionLetter.title: Self-Compassion Letter
selfCompassionLetter.description: Write a short letter to yourself offering kindness and support, as if you were your own best friend.

confidenceBuildingPractice.title: Confidence Building Practice
confidenceBuildingPractice.description: Identify your strengths and practice celebrating your unique qualities.

authenticExpressionPractice.title: Authentic Expression Practice
authenticExpressionPractice.description: Describe a time you didn't speak your truth. What would you say now?

activeListeningChallenge.title: Active Listening Challenge
activeListeningChallenge.description: Practice deep listening skills with someone in your life this week.

relationshipBoundariesDefinition.title: Relationship Boundaries Definition
relationshipBoundariesDefinition.description: List 3 emotional boundaries that you need in a healthy relationship.
relationshipBoundariesDefinition.goal: Define what is okay — and what's not — for you in a relationship

standardsAssessment.title: Standards Assessment
standardsAssessment.description: Define your non-negotiable standards for a romantic partnership.
standardsAssessment.goal: Define what is okay — and what's not — for you in a relationship

relationshipVisionBoard.title: Relationship Vision Board
relationshipVisionBoard.description: Write a vision of your ideal relationship — what does it feel like? What do you bring into it?
relationshipVisionBoard.goal: Clarify the kind of connection you're seeking

valuesAlignmentExercise.title: Values Alignment Exercise
valuesAlignmentExercise.description: Explore how your values align with your relationship vision.
valuesAlignmentExercise.goal: Clarify the kind of connection you're seeking

socialConnectionPractice.title: Social Connection Practice
socialConnectionPractice.description: Start a short conversation with someone new this week. Reflect on how it felt.
socialConnectionPractice.goal: Begin taking intentional action in real life
socialConnectionPractice.focus: Initiating conversations, putting self out there

comfortZoneExpansion.title: Comfort Zone Expansion
comfortZoneExpansion.description: Take one small step outside your comfort zone in social situations.
comfortZoneExpansion.goal: Begin taking intentional action in real life
comfortZoneExpansion.focus: Initiating conversations, putting self out there

rejectionReframeExercise.title: Rejection Reframe Exercise
rejectionReframeExercise.description: Recall a recent rejection or let-down. What did you learn? What did you make it mean about yourself?
rejectionReframeExercise.goal: Build resilience in the face of emotional risk

resilienceBuildingToolkit.title: Resilience Building Toolkit
resilienceBuildingToolkit.description: Develop strategies for bouncing back from romantic disappointments.
resilienceBuildingToolkit.goal: Build resilience in the face of emotional risk

attractionAnalysis.title: Attraction Analysis
attractionAnalysis.description: Think of someone you were recently attracted to. What drew you in — and was it healthy?
attractionAnalysis.goal: Recognize authentic interest vs. emotional addiction
attractionAnalysis.focus: Avoiding toxic patterns, tuning into real compatibility

healthyUnhealthyPatternsAssessment.title: Healthy vs. Unhealthy Patterns Assessment
healthyUnhealthyPatternsAssessment.description: Learn to identify the difference between healthy connection and emotional addiction.
healthyUnhealthyPatternsAssessment.goal: Recognize authentic interest vs. emotional addiction
healthyUnhealthyPatternsAssessment.focus: Avoiding toxic patterns, tuning into real compatibility

journeyReflection.title: Journey Reflection
journeyReflection.description: In your own words, how have you changed since beginning this journey? What are you ready for now?
journeyReflection.goal: Reflect on growth and prepare for long-term connection

readinessAssessmentCommitment.title: Readiness Assessment & Commitment
readinessAssessmentCommitment.description: Evaluate your readiness for a healthy, conscious relationship.
readinessAssessmentCommitment.goal: Reflect on growth and prepare for long-term connection

defineCoreValues: What values guide your daily decisions?
Which values are non-negotiable in relationships?
How do your values influence your relationship choices?
When have you compromised your values? How did it feel?
What values do you want to embody more fully?

relationshipPatternAnalysis: What patterns do you notice across your relationships?
What role do you typically play in relationships?
What lessons have your past relationships taught you?
Which relationship patterns serve you? Which don't?
What would you do differently in future relationships?

fearIdentificationExercise: What are your biggest fears about relationships?
What beliefs about love hold you back?
When do you feel most vulnerable in relationships?
What stories do you tell yourself about your worthiness?
How do these fears protect you? How do they limit you?

triggerResponseAnalysis: What situations typically trigger strong emotions for you?
How do you usually react when triggered?
What physical sensations do you notice when triggered?
What would a healthier response look like?
How can you create space between trigger and response?

selfCompassionLetter: What would you say to a dear friend going through your situation?
What kindness do you need to hear right now?
How can you be more gentle with yourself?
What are you most proud of about your journey so far?
What would unconditional self-love look like?

authenticExpressionPractice: When do you find it hardest to speak your truth?
What prevents you from being fully honest?
How do you want to communicate your needs?
What would authentic vulnerability look like for you?
How can you balance honesty with kindness?

relationshipBoundariesDefinition: What behaviors are absolutely unacceptable to you?
What do you need to feel safe and respected?
How do you want to be treated when you're upset?
What boundaries have you struggled to maintain?
How will you communicate your boundaries clearly?

relationshipVisionBoard: How do you want to feel in your ideal relationship?
What kind of partnership do you envision?
What qualities do you want in a life partner?
How do you want to grow together?
What would you contribute to this relationship?

comfortZoneExpansion: What feels scary but exciting about meeting new people?
How did it feel to step outside your comfort zone?
What did you learn about yourself?
What would you do differently next time?
How can you continue expanding your social world?

rejectionReframeExercise: How do you typically handle rejection?
What stories do you tell yourself when things don't work out?
What would rejection mean if it wasn't about your worth?
How can you stay open while protecting your heart?
What would fearless dating look like for you?

attractionAnalysis: What typically attracts you to someone?
Do you confuse intensity with compatibility?
What red flags have you ignored because of attraction?
How do you distinguish healthy attraction from unhealthy patterns?
What would balanced, healthy attraction feel like?

journeyReflection: What has been your biggest breakthrough in this journey?
How has your relationship with yourself changed?
What patterns have you released or transformed?
What new strengths have you discovered?
How do you feel different about love and relationships now?
